description: This file implements advanced processing functions for handling HTTP chunked transfer encoding, including examining payloads, processing received buffers, closing connections, removing transfer codings, processing chunk data, and handling trailers. It is part of the Http Mbo Chunked Object and interacts with buffer descriptors, chunk information, and callback interfaces.

methods.name: ULONG HttpMboChkExamine(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Examines the received payload data to determine the message state, primarily used for debugging or testing with simplified logic.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkProcess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Processes a buffer descriptor containing part of an HTTP chunked message, handling various chunk states and transitioning appropriately.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkCloseUp(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Handles the end of HTTP chunked processing, finalizing the message and notifying the callback interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkRemoveCoding(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes transfer-encoding coding from the message, cleaning up buffer descriptors and related chunk info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkProcessChunkData(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo)
methods.description: Processes chunk data contained within a buffer descriptor, managing chunk boundaries, appending data, and notifying once chunks are complete.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkProcessTrailer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBdo,PBOOL pbBccIfNotified)
methods.description: Processes trailer data (additional HTTP headers after the last chunk), determines trailer completion, and signals end of message.
